name: Overblown
description:
Overblown is a split-screen couch-coop multiplayer FPS game with various game maps, modes and heroes.   Up to 4 players can play.

Game Modes
  • Death Match
  • Control Point
  • The Assassins
  • Hunter
  • Shoot-Tag
  • What the Ball?

Each game mode has a selection of heroes to choose.

Controls Mouse/keyboard
  • W, A, S, D - Forwards, backwards, strafe left, strafe right
  • LMB - Shoot
  • RMB - Secondary ability
  • Space - Jump
  • R - Reload
  • U - Ultimate
  • F1 - Toggle full-screen
  • F2 - Toggle windowed full-screen (useful for recording video).
  • Esc - Exit
PS4 controllers
  • R1 - Shoot
  • L1 - Secondary Ability
  • X - Jump
  • Square - Reload
  • Triangle - Ultimate
Source Code

Source code is available from https://github.com/SteveSmith16384/OverblownGame
